content.rendered:
As we head towards the end of the year, we wanted to update you on student device return. Device return is going to start Monday, June 6th and continue through Friday, June 10th. Devices will be turned in at the Help Desk, Room A107.

The plan is: 

  • Monday June 6th: 9th grade 
  • Tuesday June 7th: 10th Grade 
  • Wednesday June 8th: 11th Grade 
  • Thursday June 9th: 12th Grade 
  • Friday June 10th: Students that were absent earlier in the week. 

All school devices need to be returned before graduation and no devices should be kept over the summer. If you have any questions, please reach out to our tech department via email or phone.  

Their contact info:  

Hunter Rumpf: h_rumpf@saratogaschools.org  

Matt Greenwood: m_greenwood@saratogaschools.org 

Phone Number: 518-587-6690 ext. 33630 

Thank you.
